__e: In a haystack of, what, eight million people, and you were able to find out where he was in only three months?
I remember the mayor made a big stink about this.
I have never in my life seen so much hay.
Why, that's a cinch. All you have to do is get a horse to eat the hay and then X-ray the horse.
I didn't talk to him at length about it, but, you know, we were delivering hay, and he was just broke up.
He was already thinking of his hay and a nice place to sleep.
